anti-VM-technique.description: Advanced Virtual Machine and Hypervisor Detection techniques. Detects if code is running inside a VM or on a physical host machine using various detection methods.

AntiDBG-techniques.description: Collection of Anti-Debugging techniques to detect and prevent debugger attachment. Implements various methods to identify debugging environments.

Simple-Ransomware-Example.description: Educational ransomware example demonstrating encryption mechanisms. Created strictly for cybersecurity research and learning purposes.

WindowsDefenderBypasseTechnqueFirstBlog.description: AMSI Bypass techniques in C++. Demonstrates methods to evade Windows Antimalware Scan Interface (AMSI) through memory patching of AmsiScanBuffer function.

windows-internals-cours-and-exercice.description: Windows Internals course materials and practical exercises. Covers low-level Windows system programming concepts and implementations.

Windows-System-Programming.description: Windows System Programming projects and examples. Deep dive into Windows API, kernel-mode programming, and system-level operations.

DEVJAM_code_crackers.description: DevJam Code Crackers competition project. Team-based coding challenge solution demonstrating problem-solving and algorithmic skills.

DEVJEM_code_crackers-.description: IT DevJam competition entry. Collaborative development project showcasing innovative solutions for competition challenges.

voting-dapp-platform.description: Decentralized Voting Platform built with Solidity and React. Secure blockchain-based voting system leveraging Ethereum smart contracts for transparent elections.

library-management-system.description: Library Management System with Python. Complete CRUD application for managing books, members, and library operations with database integration.

operating-systemTP.description: Operating System practical exercises focusing on processes and threads. Implementations of concurrent programming concepts and synchronization mechanisms.

JavaExerciceCoursera.description: Java programming exercises from Coursera courses. Collection of object-oriented programming challenges and solutions.
